introduction: WikiImporter is a tool that lets new wiki importers to easily import new wikis from Incubator.
dbname: Database name of the production wiki
clean-scheduled: Cleaning of wiki XML was successfully scheduled.
clean-scheduled-long: Cleaning of wiki XML was successfully scheduled. Once it is ready, the split button will be available in the wiki main page.
split-scheduled: Splitting of wiki XML was successfully scheduled.
split-scheduled-long: Splitting of wiki XML was successfully scheduled. Once it is ready, the import button will be available in the wiki main page.
new-wiki: Add a new wiki to the database
